Usage¶

Command Operation.

New¶

$ python manage.py generate spine:new your_app

Scaffold¶

$ python manage.py generate spine:scaffold your_app example name content message

Model¶

$ python manage.py generate spine:model your_app example name content message

Controller¶

$ python manage.py generate spine:model your_app

Help¶

For more information, please run the below.

$ python manage.py generate -h
$ python manage.py generate spine:new -h
$ python manage.py generate spine:scaffold -h
